Reviews.Title: “Very nice place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Kay G
Reviews.Content: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Everyone we came in contact with was so nice. From the front desk to the ladies serving breakfast to the maintenance man. Any problems we had, they were right there to take care of it. Our room was very clean and up to date. I would highly reccommend this hotel to anyone. We even loved the location. It is centrally located to the shows or whatever you may need in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful management & personnel”
Reviews.Author: Irma L
Reviews.Content: Friends and I recently stayed at this Inn. COMFORT is its 1st name and COMFORT is what you get. From front desk personnel to the ladies who served the wonderful breakfast, we found everyone helpful and adding to our stay.

Reviews.Title: “Very clean hotel”
Reviews.Author: Shutthebackdoor
Reviews.Content: Our room was very clean, cool and great mattress. The staff were very nice and helpful. Will definitely stay here again given the opportunity. The breakfast was fine, the usual cereal, yogurt, fruit, biscuits and gravy, waffles and various kinds of bread. We did not use the pool, but the area looked very clean.

Reviews.Title: “Nice stay”
Reviews.Author: Clinton_ILCruiser
Reviews.Content: Stayed over the labor day weekend. Nice place. Very quite, close to all the attractions in Branson. Very clean. Bed is very comforable. AC kept the room nice and cold!!! The Wifi is very fast! Breakfast was adequate. Scrambled eggs, sausage, toast, various cereals, and waffles. Overall, pretty nice, nothing all the special, but I would stay again. Staff was very nice and accomodating.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: grandma3x
Reviews.Content: Very friendly and knowlegable staff!!! Our room could not have been more comfortable. Very clean. This hotel went above and beyond our expectations. We will definately stay there again! Loved the indoor pool!

Reviews.Title: “Not bad but will need to update soon to maintain its standing”
Reviews.Author: WolvesinUSA
Reviews.Content: On the whole its an okay hotel nothing more. Staff were friendly, rooms were clean, breakfast decent and the staff were very dilgent when we were removing items from the safety deposit box. On the negative side the decoration is a little tired and perhaps dated in style. The breakfast area was way to small and I suspect would have been very busy if the hotel was sold out. The business computer was in the lobby not in a seperate room and didnt have a chair. There was a small shop where you could prepurchase tickets. We found the gentleman in there to be very friendly but not very efficient making a number of errors. Whilst I don't believe he worked directly for the hotel i'd have expected better service.

Reviews.Title: “had a blast”
Reviews.Author: victoryfestus_MO
Reviews.Content: My husband and I loved the location of this hotel. It is in the midst of everything yet a little off the beaten path and away from the traffic. Our grandchildren was also with us and loved it as well especially the pool. Very clean and comfortable,affordable and friendly. Just made our stay worry free. We will stay again.

Reviews.Title: “They Do It Right”
Reviews.Author: BankguyArkansas
Reviews.Content: Just made our second visit to the Comfort Inn at Thousand Hills and they just do it right. This place puts the guest wishes first. From the people working the front desk to the ladies working the free breakfast area, they are friendly and always trying to help with anything you might need. This place is also clean. The location is just off of Hwy 76 and is close to shows, shopping and restaurants. The golf course behind it gives you the feeling of being far away from the heavy traffic on Hwy 76. Our grandkids love the indoor pool especially when the temperature is over 100 degrees. We will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Stay here in Branson!”
Reviews.Author: Al V
Reviews.Content: Not only is this a great hotel in a great location at a great price, but they also have the greatest people anywhere. A special shout out to Terry, Carol and Stanley who became like family over the course of our week long stay. If you are going to Branson, check this place out for sure!

Reviews.Title: “Good location, good price”
Reviews.Author: twogr8ize
Reviews.Content: We stayed in a King room, it was large, clean and just fine. Two sinks which is a plus! Breakfast was good, they had hot scrambled eggs and sausage patties plus all the other staples. Right next to a steakhouse for food and drinks. Mini golf across the street. Didn't use the pool or fitness center but the pool looked nice.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Location, nice hotel, not perfect”
Reviews.Author: Fayettenam
Reviews.Content: Checked in for a quick two night stay in Branson. Fitness Center is small and dated. Indoor Pool was nice and kept clean in and around area. Continental Breakfast was pretty good, had a sweet little lady in charge of keeping it up, and she was doing well. The rooms are a bit dated, albeit clean. In our two day stay however, we did not get our room serviced for some reason. We went and asked for new towels the next day, and were given some. Also, we booked a room with a view of the golf course, and instead got the parking lot side.

Reviews.Title: “Not Good”
Reviews.Author: mrsezer
Reviews.Content: After reading the reviews, we were excited about our stay. Wrong! The room had a bad odor and was very dated. It just had a dirty feel. We checked out after 1 night. Not sure how it made the top ten list.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Marene W
Reviews.Content: My sisters and I stayed at this hotel last month. We were celebrating a birthday. This was a wonderful place to stay and everyone was very friendly and the rooms were clean. We will return to this hotel the next time we go to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Place”
Reviews.Author: Cindy M
Reviews.Content: The Comfort Inn at Thousand Hills met all of our expectations. It was very clean. The staff were all extra friendly and accommodating. It is a lovely place. We had no complaints whatsoever. We will only stay there every time we go to Branson. Thanks for the wonderful experience.

Reviews.Title: “Spring Time in the Ozarks”
Reviews.Author: Bill W
Reviews.Content: Our veterans' group thoroughly enjoyed our stay at CI@1000Hills. I've arranged several reunions and the staff are, by far, the most enthusiastic and easy to work with groupI've seen. I am a retired hotelier, and tend to be picky. The property, the rooms, service, meeting room, and the wonderful breakfast ladies! A real "WOW" factor. Bill Ward,CHA US Army (Retired)

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay and Great Staff”
Reviews.Author: Melanie722
Reviews.Content: This was our first visit to Branson and this Comfort Inn was the best !!!!!! The staff was wonderful, the gift shop was great on getting us all of our tickets to the shows...we will stay here again when we return next year !!!!!! It was clean, quiet, and the breakfast was wonderful !!!!! We can't wait to go back !!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Best in Branson”
Reviews.Author: bobkat45
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at numerous properties in Branson, MO., and this Comfort Inn at Thousand Hills is the BEST. From the time we checked in to four days later when we checked out we had no complaints. The front desk crew, the kitchen crew, the housekeeping and maintenance crew were all great. Property was clean, quiet, and attractive. We will stay here from now on when we visit Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Extremely pleasant and helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: taztraveler
Reviews.Content: The staff was helpful in suggesting a couple of shows to see. We took their advise and were very pleased. We purchased the show tickets at the hotel gift shop and later found that the tickets were less expensive than if purchased at one of the other tickets outlets or at the theatre box office. Three days at the hotel and I highly recommend this hotel. Clean, well maintained, a breakfast with good choice of selection, reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly, Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: gmnading
Reviews.Content: We stay at this Comfort Inn everytime we go to Branson. The staff is helpful and friendly. Breakfast has eggs, sauage, waffles and many more items. Rooms are clean and roomy.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place”
Reviews.Author: NomadicDream
Reviews.Content: Just spent about 10 days at this hotel. Very clean. Helpful and friendly staff. Nice pool area. Convenient location. Breakfast had the typical fare, i.e donuts, bagels, waffles, oatmeal, hard-boiled eggs, etc etc. . No complaints and excellent value for the money I have no problem recommending and would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Really great place all around”
Reviews.Author: Eztrip44
Reviews.Content: We've stayed at this hotel twice...great experience both times! Love the pool stays open really late! Rooms have always been nice and clean and breakfast was good! Very friendly and helpful staff...recommend it and will stay there again! :)

Reviews.Title: “Great place!”
Reviews.Author: jdck
Reviews.Content: We go to Branson quite a few times during the year and try to stay at this hotel. It is very clean with an excellent breakfast. The inside pool is also an added plus. All of the employees are courteous and helpful which makes the stay even more pleasant.

Reviews.Title: “What a wonderful stay!”
Reviews.Author: midwesterner1kansas
Reviews.Content: Wonderful place to stay! Good hot breakfast every morning with many choices. Each room has its own individual thermostat which makes it easy to be comfortable. Rooms are very clean and staff is very helpful with any questions. Definitely will stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Shining light in a hectic weekend”
Reviews.Author: swost
Reviews.Content: We were tired, hungry and stressed when we pulled into this hotel. The staff greeted us warm and friendly. The rooms were comfortable for 3 adults. A little off the path but well worth it. The prices were reasonable - a flat out bargain actually. Thank you Trip Advisor for recommending this location.

Reviews.Title: “WARM, WELCOMING & EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE”
Reviews.Author: L H
Reviews.Content: We have been to Branson many times in the past, but this was our first stay at this hotel. We were pleasantly surprised at the warm, welcoming attitude of the staff, as well as the large clean suite we stayed in for the week. We were in a two-bedroom suite and it was quite spacious. It also had a refrigerator and microwave without any additional charge, which other hotels in Branson are famous for charging from $10 to $20 per day for these items to be added to your room. I'm always worried about the level of cleanliness of the room, and I was very happy with the suite. It was very clean and smelled clean. The first night we had trouble with one of the thermostats in the front bedroom. The staff member at the front desk left her post and immediately came to our room to assist us with getting the room to the temperature we wanted, and she couldn't do enough to accommodate us. She even called when she got back downstairs to check on us and see if we needed anything further. I highly recommend this location. My two words of caution involve computer usage and parking. If you are a business professional who needs to use a computer at this location, there is one in the lobby, but you must stand to use it - so beware. I was able to get a good signal from my room, so I didn't have to use their computer. Also, a couple of the nights that we were there, the hotel was sold out and the parking was tough. There were places to park, but it was quite a walk if you came in late at night. Other than those two items, everything was fantastic. This hotel also offers a free breakfast with the room, so that was definitely an added value. If you are someone traveling that wants a friendly, clean place to stay that is also very quiet - this is it. Addtionally, for safety features, it has interior corridors which I consider much safer than the multitude of hotels in the Branson area with exterior corridors. My standards are very high when traveling, and I can recommend this hotel as a cut above in the Branson area where many of the hotels are older and not as clean as they should be. I hope my recommendation helps you with your stay.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: getty2go
Reviews.Content: Clean hotel with a great location. Good breakfast. Staff was very nice and accomodating. One issue with one of the staff at the front desk, he didn't know much about local Branson for guidance. Maybe he was new to town? Purchased show tickets in the hotel. Had a room on the lowest level and did not receive cell phone service while in the room - when booking you should ask about cell phone service. Other people in my party did receive service in another room on the same floor. Would stay at this property again!

Reviews.Title: “Great staff!”
Reviews.Author: Howbald
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed here on a little getaway. The staff was very helpful and the place was clean as a pin. Breakfast was standard hotel fare. the hotel was quiet even though there were several bus groops there. One small problem, if you retire early, the parking lot flood lights will keep your room lit up till they turn them off later at night.

Reviews.Title: “Great location! Great staff!”
Reviews.Author: wonderlust86
Reviews.Content: Right off the middle of the strip. Right on the golf course. The staff will bend over backward for you. They are all very sweet and helpful. I really like that there are washers and dryers for guest use. Couldn't ask for a better location! Very clean rooms.

Reviews.Title: “Thoroughly enjoyed our stay here”
Reviews.Author: cnh624
Reviews.Content: We found this hotel quite by accident. We were looking for a room at 11:00 p.m. and I started calling the hotels I could find listed on my GPS that were near, they quoted me a very reasonable rate and we booked a room. Were so pleased with our accomodations that we stayed 2 more additional nights. Could not have been more pleased. Easy walking to many attractions. I travel with my 60-something year old mother and 4 and 5 year old sons. We really appreciated the family friendly attitude of this hotel. Breakfast was good too and we enjoyed the indoor pool.

Reviews.Title: “Best Stay Ever”
Reviews.Author: rerewill
Reviews.Content: I Stayed at this location in September of 2011. I arrived before the listed check-in time,but I was allowed to check in anyways. The King bed room is spacious with a nice reclining chair in the room. The washroom is large with tub mats and all the other ammenities. The complimentary breakfast is outstanding, as well as the rest of the hotel staff. The property has a pool,suana, and a fitness room. I highly recommend this Hotel.

Reviews.Title: “We will stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: Karl S
Reviews.Content: We had a great experience at the Comfort Inn. We chose this hotel because the owners are Christians andwe wanted to support their endeavor to be an upstanding hotel in Branson. The hotel is very clean, the staff was very friendly, the breakfast was great! We will definitely be staying here again.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed our stay and will be back”
Reviews.Author: Janice C
Reviews.Content: Hotel is very clean. Staff very friendly and helpful. Breakfast great. Has other amenities. Is convenient to attractions in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Loved this basic hotel”
Reviews.Author: HKFoodie
Reviews.Content: This is typical Comfort Inn at reasonable rate of $122 p.n. (inc). Parking available and off the main highway so a bit more quiet. Free breakfast is continental although they have a waffle making machine that's nice. The rooms are decent size. Lots of families staying here in the summer. Very friendly & helpful staff.

Reviews.Title: “We enjoyed our stay and would stay again.”
Reviews.Author: DBIOWA
Reviews.Content: I always read reviews on Trip Advisor before planning a trip and the reviews were good so we selected this hotel. We are glad we did. We stayed for 2 nights and was very satisfied with our choice. Our room was on the 4th Floor, very clean, nicely furnished, and was quiet. The breakfast had a good variety of items. The food was good and the 2 gals kept it well stocked and clean. The staff was very helpful and friendly. The location was good - easy access to everything. We recommend staying at this hotel on your next trip to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Great Inn”
Reviews.Author: JPGOFF
Reviews.Content: A very good motel a little off Hwy 76. Real quiet location, but close to everything. Our 2nd floor room was large and very clean and comfortable. The dining area could get a little crowded, but the food was great and lots of it. Sausage, eggs, biscuits and loads of other items. The ladies kept it real clean and well stocked. The front desk was very helpful in finding restaurants and other places. Stanley was very helpful in our reservations and made us feel like we were at home. Thanks! We will be back! As far as the "pushing religion" comment, there was a Bible on the table, just like a lot of other motels and hotels. There was no preaching just thoughtful and helpful employees. We will be using this Comfort Inn when we go to Branson again.

Reviews.Title: “Always a Wonderful Stay”
Reviews.Author: Greg R
Reviews.Content: Never disappointed, always sleep well, great location, clean rooms, friendly people, nice ammenities - these are things I love about this hotel every time I stay there. I could pay more for a room and get less, but why would I do that. Kudo's to the Management and Staff there for another great stay! Greg R.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Quiet, Affordable and Friendly”
Reviews.Author: Docksider
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel based on price and reviews and because we thought we would benefit by using it as part of the "Choice Privleges" program. We were in Branson for a family reunion and wanted a place that would not be overly expensive, but still provide an acceptable level of comfort. First the hotel itself........We were absolutely delighted with our stay. At check in we were greeted with smiles. Any time we had questions, the staff was there to help with suggestions, maps etc. Our room was exceptionally clean. The maid service repsected our privacy and we never felt as though we had to clear out of our room by a certain time so they could clean it. Amenities were plentiful and furniture, carpeting, quilts etc were in superb shape and top notch. The breakfast was what one would expect from a facility such as this...... eggs, sausage, waffles, biscuits and gravy, donuts, bagels, cereal, juice and coffee. All in all good food and the bins were always full. The breakfast room itself was a bit small and at times finding a seat became a bit difficult but many folks simply chose to take their food back to their rooms and no one from the hotel objected. And if you were a bit patient, a seat always seemed to open up. There was a gift store off the lobby and it was convenient for some of those small needs as well as several souvenirs. NOW.... a word to the wise about the "Choice Priveleges" program. As with any program such as this, make sure you read the fine print and understand all the rules and regulations. We jumped on board because of their advertisement that said "Stay two nights....get one free." With more than twn different name hotels from which to choose, we thought this would be a snap on our two week vacation. Well.......not quite! You see, you gain points for the nights you stay in one of their hotels. You then redeem those points for your free stay. If you want to use your points after two nights for a stay in "East Overshoe", you might be able to, However if you want to use your points for someplace worthwhile, you will either need 4-6 nights to accumulate the points necessary for the one free night, or wait until the "dead season" to use them. Choice will tell you they explain all that, but in reality, they don't mention it nearly as often as they say "Stay two nights, get one free." And of course that promotion ends in early August (when the real busy tourist season is over). Just be careful. We booked this hotel on it's merit. That was a wise choice!! It is affordable and very nice in every respect.....including the price. It is a wonderful hotel at a great price in a very popular town. Just don't book it to get a free night.....unless you are going to stay in several different Choice Hotels for the next week or so. We've stayed 6 nights in a Choice Hotel and STILL don't have enough points to stay in a hotel in any tourist area in Wyoming, Missouri, Montana or South Dakota. But try the Comfort Inn at Thousand Hills. Consider what you get for what you pay......you will be pleased!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful hotel”
Reviews.Author: smilesunshine57
Reviews.Content: We stayed for a week and this hotel was the best. The staff was wonderful and very helpful with what shows to see, where to eat and other attractions that are worth while to pay for. The rooms are clean and the cleaning staff does a wonderful job making sure everyone has enough towels and other products. The pool was great but sometimes the whirlpool was too hot and jets didn't work. The back deck was spacious and had plenty of chairs to lay out. I do have one complaint. The pillows on the bed were super small, it's like they cut a queen pillow down the middle and made two pillows out of it. I really hated them and was glad I brought my own.

Reviews.Title: “we loved it and we'll be back”
Reviews.Author: harryhegel
Reviews.Content: great location , very friendly staff, very clean, we will stay here again and again

Reviews.Title: “Great family place”
Reviews.Author: Castle_Rocker_12
Reviews.Content: Very clean and wholesome place to take the family. Only HBO Family on the TV, no bar, and a great pool and hot tub area. The hotel was highly rated on Trip advisor, so we went there. I would not hesitate to go back and take the family. The staff was friendly and even signed me up for choice rewards while I went out one night and had it ready for me in the morning. The room was clean and well kept but was a bit small for my taste for the price.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect place for us!”
Reviews.Author: juary
Reviews.Content: Picked Comfort Inn at Thousand Hills after reviewing comments on Tripadvisor. We could not have been more pleased. From the person who made my reservation on the phone, to every member of the staff that we had contact with - all were so pleasant and helpful. The room was very clean. We could park, enter a door walk a short way and we were in our room. The breakfast looked great, my husband enjoyed the coffee. Beautiful and comfortable and in a great location with great staff, what more could you want? The pool (indoor) looked inviting too. We have been going to Branson for over 30 years and this was the best experience, will be our place to stay from now on!

Reviews.Title: “Very clean hotel, but DO NOT stay on the first floor especially room 101! It smells terribly musty!”
Reviews.Author: OSUgirl23
Reviews.Content: We always stay at this Hotel when in Branson, but when I was sent to a room on the first floor it smelled horribly musty and damp! Within minutes of being in the room my throught started closing up and becomming scratchy! I dont know what it was but it was not good for me! They did find me another room, but only gave me a $10 discount on the first night of a 3 night stay after I asked for a discount for our trouble. All in all it is a clean Christian establishment and that is hard to come by so we will be back. I just would have excepted an appoligy and instead I just felt like I was bothering them by asking for another room. :(

Reviews.Title: “Great vacation value”
Reviews.Author: kidlungdoc
Reviews.Content: This hotel filled all our needs. Friendly check-in and folks all eager to help. Breakfast was free and included eggs, potatoes, biscuits, breads, cereal, juice, coffee, and you could even make your own waffles (the cinammon was quite good). The room was clean and well maintained. The two sinks were nice to have in the morning. The indoor pool and hot tub were clean and relaxing after a hard day's play at Silver Dollar City. Perfect location. A DQ and mini-golf were within walking distance as was a steakhouse and Italian restaurant. Everything else was a very short drive. Conveniently located on the yellow route so that you can avoid 76. Overall, a great value. Will use again.

Reviews.Title: “Fun and Filling”
Reviews.Author: REL62360
Reviews.Content: I loved the gameroom and pool! The breakfast was great too! Not too many hotels offer 2 different types of waffles, eggs, sausage, biscuits and gravy, etc.

Reviews.Title: “Good Place, Except....”
Reviews.Author: okgeeze
Reviews.Content: We stayed here in late 2009 and it was a good place, so we tried it again this time. Most things were fine - clean, nice room, nice surroundings. My only complaint was the free breakfast. This hotel apparently catches a lot of tour bus business, which overloads the dining area in the mornings. We spent 3 nights at this hotel and the tour bus folks overran the dining room 2 of the mornings. We had to schlep our food back to our room once. We got lucky the second time when a couple of strangers asked us to sit at the two vacant spots at their table. Whoever designed this building was negligent when it came to dining space. I think that with a little imagination, the management could improve things in the morning by better utilizing wasted space in the lobby. The breakfast problem is a shame, as this is otherwise a really good place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Best in Branson”
Reviews.Author: kaseyssi
Reviews.Content: You can't ask for a nicer, cleaner hotel to stay at. My wife and 3 children stayed here fro Mothers Day weekend and were truely impressed. The staff went out of their way to make sure that we were taken care of. Great location, lots of things close by.

Reviews.Title: “This is a wonderful Hotel and the staff is Great in everyway”
Reviews.Author: GDGrammie
Reviews.Content: When we arrived there was a mix up with my reservations which had been made with Choice Hotels through the phone. An Assistant Manager was immediately called to the desk and an upgrade arrangement was made for one night. We stayed 4 more nights and our room was on the back side of the Hotel and was a quiet room. Fridg and micowave were provided and room was large and decorated nicely. The location was handy to all the theaters and restaurants. The breakfast was great with a large assortment to choose from. Including hot biscuts and sausage gravey. I would recommend this hotel to everyone. The price was excellent and I loved the idea of the open Bible in each room. Gift shop was great too.

Reviews.Title: “The Myer family of hotels does it RIGHT!!!”
Reviews.Author: betch4
Reviews.Content: We just returned from a quick overnight stay in Branson and couldn't wait to post an amazing review about this property. We are avid trip advisor users and try to post whenever we travel......hey we take away a lot from TA reviews..might as well contribute once and a while! :) Last December, we previously researched and stayed at another Myer Hotel property in Branson (Best Western Music Capital inn). The reviews on that property were amazing and we were sooooo happy - the service, quality and cleanliness were SUPERB! So when we decided to return for a quick overnight trip to Silver Dollar City, we were disappointed that they were sold out. After a little research, we chose this Myer hotel property (there are six Myer owned and operated hotels in the area). Like its sister property, this one was high on trip advisor's Branson hotels as well. (I think #3..and there's A LOT of Branson hotels!!!) We booked over the phone about three weeks in advance since we received up for a coupon through their webpage (it's a easy 15% off your 1st stay just for signing up). What a great and friendly guy Mick (?) was..a lovely brittish fellow! :) So helpful and sweet. We also called the day before we arrived to reconfirm details of the reservation (room type/rollaways, etc) and spoke with Stanley. He was so nice as well. We stopped by the morning of check-in and although they didn't have our rooms ready, we met Stanley and another gentleman at the desk .Both greeted us and were so kind! When we returned later that evening to check in - both desk attendants were just as helpful, thorough and kind as well. Actually- every employee we came in contact within the hotel were the same way. This company must take great care and pride in hiring the right employees! To our surprise Stanley had upgraded us to a larger suite for my husband and two little girls. I think the hotelwas very full and rollaways/and our preferred room weren't readily available. We were soooo appreciative of that thoughtfulness. Most importantly everything about these hotels are IMMACULATELY CLEAN!!!! The rooms, bathrooms, halls, pool, breakfast areas, etc. I wish all hotel chains could take training from the Myer's family/staff. I mean ABSOLUTELY SPOTLESS. For this reason alone I would return again and again to these properties..and any others they own and operate. Too bad they are only in Branson. (haha) The indoor pool was fun for the kids (open late too!) as well as the game room and sweet ice cream vending machine- they loved it. Breakfast was nice and pretty comparable to a Drury Inn, on a smaller scale. We do a lot of traveling all over the country as a family and also both work for a major worldwide hotel/resort brand. We are so impressed by the Myer hotels. We only come to Branson maybe once or twice a year to bring my mom. (She likes the shows). haha But when we do we will be sure to choose one of these incredible properties again and again! Thanks again to Stanley and all the staff we met the past few days!

Reviews.Title: “Loved it.”
Reviews.Author: Bill_and_M
Reviews.Content: Great stay. Room was clean. Staff friendly and helpful. Breakfast was great.

Reviews.Title: “Staff were great.”
Reviews.Author: Golfgpa43
Reviews.Content: The entire staff were very friendly and helpful. It made our stay enjoyable. The gift shop staff procured us excellent seats to shows at the last minute. We had a ground floor room that was very quiet.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: ksinkc
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel on New Years day and found it to be centrally located and the staff very friendly and helpful. The continental breakfast was better than most and the room very clean and quiet. Our room had a microwave, coffeemaker and mini refridgerator. No complaints.

Reviews.Title: “We have had several great stays here”
Reviews.Author: cvclassic
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at this hotel several times and the service is always great. Everything is always clean and everyone is friendly and willing to help in anyway. They have a great breakfast in the morning as well. I would recommend anyone traveling to Branson that is looking for a nice place and nice priced place to stay to try the Comfort Inn Thousand Hills.

Reviews.Title: “disappointed!”
Reviews.Author: midwesterner1kansas
Reviews.Content: This hotel states that it has a platinum award, which is supposed to mean that it is ranked in the top 3% for this Choice Hotel brand. However, we don't feel it measured up to our expectations. The breakfast that was offered was the same all four mornings that we were there. Biscuits and gravy were offered.... biscuits were cold and hard, gravy was lukewarm. Standard cereal, boiled eggs, no flavored creamer for the coffee, etc... disappointing. Our bed was poor quality also - lumpy, hard. Fitted sheet had a large softball size stain on the side of the sheet. I do think the sheet was clean, but a large black stain that had not come out probably could have been taken care of with some bleach. Pillows were very small, square shaped, and very lumpy! Probably will choose another hotel next time we travel to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Would stay here again.”
Reviews.Author: TurtleGirl2010
Reviews.Content: The room at this Comfort Inn was spotlessly clean, and everything was in working order. We especially enjoyed the pool and hot tub, both of which were at perfect temperatures, neither too hot nor too cold. The breakfast had a pretty good "buffet," two waffle irons going, hard-boiled eggs, toast, donuts, cereals, fruit, instant oatmeal, juices, coffees, etc. It could have offered a little larger hot selection, like bacon and maybe french toast and scrambled eggs. That would have been nice, as the waffle irons were in constant use and we never able to get any. Front desk personnel were friendly and helpful. The room air conditioner was a tad noisy, and I had to put in ear plugs to be able to sleep. Other than that, we would stay here again. It was very clean and fairly well priced at $85/night with our AARP discount.

Reviews.Title: “Good staff, nice room...”
Reviews.Author: NorthForty
Reviews.Content: Quality of desk staff was evident from from the start as an employee hurried over to hold the door for us. We had a standard king room and size and layout were more than sufficient for the two of us. Common areas and room were very clean and well-maintained. Breakfast offered a somewhat limited selection, (even by Comfort Inn standards) seating area appeared small for the size of the hotel. Lots of lodging choices in Branson but I'd probably return here on our next visit.

Reviews.Title: “Met our expectations”
Reviews.Author: dmbkDallasTX
Reviews.Content: We have trusted Trip Advisor on many trips and this hotel has continued the trend. The hotel was spotless and the staff was very friendly and helpful. Great location in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “So glad I came to tripadvisor for this one”
Reviews.Author: tlow76
Reviews.Content: The reviews on the site steered me straight once again. My husband and 3 boys stayed here this past weekend. The staff was so friendly.... everyone I passed greeted me. The room was spotless! Everything from the continental breakfast to the pool was fantastic. Even has a little game room with a few arcade games and pool table for the kiddos. Love that the pool was open til midnight too! You can beat this place... especially for the great rate we got! This will definetely be our new go to hotel from now on when we are visiting Branson!

Reviews.Title: “Another Delightful Stay”
Reviews.Author: ARtraveler63
Reviews.Content: Have stayed here several times. Check in was especially speedy and pleasant this time. Room was clean and bed was comfortable. The bathroom layout with two separate sinks and mirror areas is a plus. Was a tad disappointed at housekeeping as it did not look like there was any attention given to cleaning the vanity sinks and counters. Tissues with makeup were left on the sink counter. Would recommend that the breakfast time be extended to 10 a. m. for those of us who think time away means "sleeping in". The breakfast attendant on the day of our visit was somewhat abrupt as one lady asked her for napkins and she said "They're all over the place". Will continue to consider this property as one of favorites as we return to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: Iowan96
Reviews.Content: Wonderful service when we checked in. Very friendly. We stayed here for 3 nights. We had a problem with the kids in the hallway but called the front desk and they took care of the noise. Our room was wonderful. The breakfast was great. We were very impressed. The beds were great to sleep in and our room was very clean. We definitely will stay there again. Excellent stay for us.

Reviews.Title: “Okay, but wish I'd looked around more”
Reviews.Author: TimeToTravel_2009
Reviews.Content: We had reservations at this property, but after check-in, wished I'd checked around more for another place to stay. The hotel was okay, but dated. Everything was average. Compared to other places we stayed on our trip to Yellowstone and Colorado, this property would rate near the bottom. There were many vacancies in town in August so a better deal may have been out there.

Reviews.Title: “Ourstanding rooms, service, pool area, and breakfast”
Reviews.Author: ChuckTCrosbyTx
Reviews.Content: Spent 3 days at Thousand Hills Comfort inn, was a great vacation, centrally located, close to everything. The breakfast ares was first class, excellent food and service. Loved the indoor pool and jacuzzi. Will book there again next year when we return.

Reviews.Title: “Super Hotel, Super Clean, Super Customer Service!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Lorhay
Reviews.Content: My mother my daughter and I stayed the week of 7/19/2010. The location is right off the strip close to lots of entertainment. Lone Star Steakhouse is right next door and Panera Bread is just down the street along with a McDonalds and a Walmart. The cleanliness of the rooms is superb!!! The room was spotless. The employees especially the housekeepers were very friendly and remembered you and would ask about how your trip was going. I was coming in to the hotel one day and my hands were full and an employee rushed to open the doors for me. The only down side to our stay was that we booked online with an online vacation service that claims to save you money and when we went to check in we heard an employee helping a customer who had called the hotel direct to book a reservation and the customer on the phone paid 20$ Less per night than we did, so word to the wise, don't book online, don't call an 800 number call the Hotel directly and make your reservation that way.

Reviews.Title: “Highly recommend”
Reviews.Author: bllrdrs_grl
Reviews.Content: Extremely clean and courteous staff. The woman in the gift shop was very helpful when booking shows. Beautiful facilities. The kids loved the pool and I loved the hot tub! After finding this gem, I know we won't be staying anywhere but here on our future visits to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful motel and staff”
Reviews.Author: kansasborn
Reviews.Content: This motel and its staff was absolutely incredible! Whether it was the front desk staff or groundskeeper or housekeeping staff, EACH person made a point to wish us a good day/night, etc-- not to mention the fact that Mick (whom we had made our reservation with on the phone) remembered who we were at checkin!! The service they offer for show and attraction tickets is WONDERFUL--such a time saver to have an envelope waiting at our checkin with all the vouchers we needed! Our room was spotless clean and cool--especially appreciated the Bible being open on the desk rather than closed in the drawer. Breakfast was absolutely unbelievable--what a bounty! This is definitely our new FAVORITE Branson motel and we will return.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice, Very Friendly--Great Stay!”
Reviews.Author: bushlamo
Reviews.Content: Have stayed in many Branson hotels and this is certainly one of the best. Very friendly staff, and a very nice hotel. Clean, great location, reasonably priced and plenty of parking. The complimentary breakfast was adequate and better than many other hotels we have been in. Will definitely stay here again on return trips to Branson. The only negative thing I could say would be about those little square pillows! Have never seen anything like that in a hotel and can only say I hope never to see them again! There's not enough pillow there for people with fat heads like me.

Reviews.Title: “great hospitality”
Reviews.Author: dogdavid
Reviews.Content: Had seen on trip advisor was rated highly. We agree as had a wonderful stay and treated very well by staff. Helped immensely find our way to shows and sightseeing opportunities. If ever in area again would definitely stay here again. Easy access to everything we wanted to see and do.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice place to stay in Branson ... nice rooms, nice staff, great location.”
Reviews.Author: Dover_Diane
Reviews.Content: My sister. my mom, my aunt and I came to Branson on vacation and stayed here for 5 nights in June 2010. The hotel is in a great location ... only a minute ot two off the main strip. Very easy access to everything you could want to see in Branson. All of the staff was very friendly and helpful. Rooms were clean, beds comfortable. We would all recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Branson. The show SIX is incredible - a must see. If you like family entertainment, see The Hughes Brothers show. Good places to eat are Mel's Hard Luck Diner and McFarlains at IMAX. Always take the yellow and red routes when possible .... the main strip is slow to drive from one end to the other. Ladies from Delaware

Reviews.Title: “Not worth the price paid”
Reviews.Author: TravelingTonya63
Reviews.Content: This place needs some serious updating. Our room had a scent of old pee to it, the toliet paper shredded in my hands and the mattress made by lower back and hips hurt. For the same money I paid for all of this, I could have stayed at a brand new Hampton by Branson Landing. If I'm ever back in the area, that's where I'll be. Not value added.

Reviews.Title: “Very clean, great staff”
Reviews.Author: Neshobadawg
Reviews.Content: We arrived about 3 hours prior to the posted check in time. The front desk clerk was very nice, radioed the housekeeping service to check on our room. Since it was ready we were allowed to go ahead and check in. The room was spacious, beds were very comfortable, and the two sinks were a nice perk. The location is right off "the strip." Far enough away from the noise, but very close to all the action. Gift shop personnel are very helpful. She printed out a listing of all the attractions for each day that we were in town...who was playing where, etc. The free breakfast was nothing special but was sufficient. If we return to Branson in the future, we definitely will stay at this property again.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful experience!”
Reviews.Author: zippy1990
Reviews.Content: This is definitely one of my favorite hotels I've been in. It was extremely clean, the service staff was very helpful and it's location is perfect, as it is close to many of the Branson area attractions but just off the beaten path so that you get a quiet night's sleep. This will be the hotel we will stay at from now on. Look no further, your pleasant night's stay is right here!! One other very nice feature is that it is a completely non-smoking facility, so you don't get over-bleed smoking smells from other rooms. The breakfast is not a cheap coffee and donuts either. They had belgian waffles, boiled eggs, cereal, (and yes donuts), fresh juice, coffee, etc... So, although the price may be a tad bit more, remember, you get a breakfast included with your purchase. If we had stayed more nights, I would have enjoyed trying out the indoor pool and hot tub. Check it out... You won't be disappointed!! :)

Reviews.Title: “Fits my priorities: Cleanliness, Quiet, Friendly Staff and Great Value”
Reviews.Author: HappyDay07
Reviews.Content: I read the other reviews before choosing this hotel. I was impressed and after my stay for 4 nights over the Memorial Day weekend, I am still impressed. It's location was perfect (near the Yellow Route), my room was large, very clean and comfortable. I especially like the extra sink outside the bathroom with a convenient makeup mirror. It had amenities you would expect to find in higher priced hotels. The staff was always friendly and helpful. I liked that they had the service of booking shows/attractions in the gift shop (with discounts). The continental breakfast included make-your-own waffles. The pool and hot tub area looked great even though I did not take advantage of them. All in all, a great place to stay that added to my very enjoyable trip to Branson. I would definitely recommend this hotel and would stay here again when and if I return.

Reviews.Title: “Almost as enjoyable as a 5 star place !”
Reviews.Author: Southerngal22
Reviews.Content: This is a place where the owners take extreme pride in every detail. We almost stayed at the Clarion but they were full. However, once we saw the location of this place - right across from Andy Williams' golf course, we knew we were in the right place. Beds were exquisitely comfortable, no short sheets! Everything looked brand new. All employees caring and professional. There was an English, London-born gentleman at front desk who was most kind. My hubby is a Brit so the two of them enjoyed a good conversation. I am sort of a clean-nut so I generally don't like hotels - even if its a 5 star. However, this room was extremely clean and I slept very peacefully indeed. I would highly recommend this place above any others I've stayed at in Branson. Quality shows -

Reviews.Title: “You can't get any better”
Reviews.Author: DMU_10
Reviews.Content: We loved this hotel. It is so clean! Our 4 year old daughter could not get enough of the indoor pool. Excellent customer service and the rates are so stinkin' low!!! Wow.

Reviews.Title: “This is a great hotel.”
Reviews.Author: Roy50
Reviews.Content: Absolutely one of the top hotels we've stayed in. This is a great, clean, and well managed hotel. I would suggest this one to anyone. Personnel are very professional. The front desk people were great and purchasing attraction tickets at the gift shop was ideal. Desi, on the front desk made our trip a very nice experience.

Reviews.Title: “Great Motel and best staff!”
Reviews.Author: kpnorton
Reviews.Content: The stay here was wonderful. The rooms were great everything was clean. The beds were comfortable we were in the 2 room suit. It worked out perfectly. Everyone was very helpful. We loved the front desk (mik from england) He was great. Loved talking with him. it was nice to come in and have friendly people helping with ideas and a smile. Everyone working the desk and house keeping were nice. We can't wait to come back in September. I would tell anyone to go there.

Reviews.Title: “Comfort Inns, Branson”
Reviews.Author: clunker
Reviews.Content: My wife and myself have stayed at the Comfort Inns at 203 Wildwood, Branson, Mo, several times during the past few years and we believe its the best place you can stay for the most reasonable price in that area. Here's why: It has the most professional and helpful employees we've seen ANYWHERE. It has the cleanest hotel and rooms we've found ANYWHERE. It had a spa, pool, exercise room, internet access, and a fabulous breakfast that everyone who stays there seems to enjoy. It is accessable off the Yellow Route thru Branson (Green Mountain Loop). It is just where you want to be when you are in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Comfot Inn at Thousand Hills met my expectations, very clean, comfortable, and one of the top places I have ever stayed”
Reviews.Author: setgfeegirl
Reviews.Content: The location was just where we wanted to stay in Branson. The service was great. My favorite was the open Bible and the prayer from the owners to the guest staying in the room, very wonderful to know this is respected and shows in the care of the employees.

Reviews.Title: “You'll never find a more helpful staff and a better location.”
Reviews.Author: laniet38
Reviews.Content: From the front desk to the cleaning staff, everyone went out of their way to be friendly. Traveling with our extended family, we booked the two bedroom suite and it worked out perfectly. Rooms, pool area, and dining area very clean - many choices for breakfast to meet anyone's wishes. Definitely a place to return to!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Staff and Accommodations”
Reviews.Author: Navigator48614
Reviews.Content: Clean, nice facilities and friendly staff. The two days we stayed at Comfort Inn Thousand Hills were the best of our six days of travel.

Reviews.Title: “We will always stay here and recommend this hotel to all of our friends”
Reviews.Author: lorian4
Reviews.Content: My husband and I were treated royally by the friendly, professional and helpful staff. The rooms were lovely and the temperature was controlled quietly and comfortably by a thermostat on our wall. There was even a heat lamp in the bathroom. We used the fridge in the room, the beds were soft pillow-topped, and the shower was perfect. The room with the heated indoor pool and hottub was large, with a beautiful view and lovely wood beams in the high ceiling with huge, gorgeous windows. We will always stay at this Comfort Inn when in Branson!

Reviews.Title: “This is the nicest hotel overall that we've ever stayed in at in Branson!"”
Reviews.Author: MerkyZ
Reviews.Content: We were very happy with our stay at Comfort Inn at Thousand Hills in Branson, MO. Each member of the staff that we encountered was exceptionally friendly and helpful. The room was very clean and comfortable and we felt at home there. The free breakfast the next morning was great and quite filling. We have been to Branson many times for trips and this hotel is by far the nicest place we've stayed.

Reviews.Title: “Great Christmas Break with Grandkids”
Reviews.Author: GrandLakeJoe
Reviews.Content: We recently took our two youngest grandkids to Branson to see Silver Dollar City with Christmas Lights. We selected Comfort Inn Thousand Hills to stay at. We could not have been happier with facility. It was nicely decorated, very clean and ready for us. The included breakfast was great also. For a moderate priced room in Branson you cannot beat this Comfort Inn. It is located in a nice central location on one of the side streets to make it easy to get to when Hwy 76 is crowded. It has an indoor pool but we did not have time to explore it, but from a distance it also looked very nice.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: bwm8184
Reviews.Content: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here. We have stayed here many times before and we always want to come back. You cannot to go wrong with any of the Myer's Hotels.

Reviews.Title: “My husband liked everything about it...it has to be good!!!”
Reviews.Author: mabijb
Reviews.Content: We were greeted by the friendly staff and checked in quickly. The rooms were very clean and spacious. The beds were perfect firmness for us. We enjoyed the hot tub, and although we didn't get in the pool, it was good size and inviting. We did not take advantage of the free breakfast so I cannot write a review about that segment of our stay. This will be our hotel of choice when in Branson, which is atleast 3 or 4 times a year.

Reviews.Title: “great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: SJjonesboro
Reviews.Content: Enjoyed our stay--very clean, friendly. very helpful.We have a family member with a peanut allergy and the staff has checked all breakfast items to be peanut-free. Will stay here each Branson visit!

Reviews.Title: “Good Experience”
Reviews.Author: Diane B
Reviews.Content: Our recent trip to Branson, Missouri was a really good one. The hotel was neat and clean. The desk clerks were very helpful. It is near Panera Bread and Lone Star Steakhouse, both good places to eat.

Reviews.Title: “Great place, friendly great service”
Reviews.Author: JAB777
Reviews.Content: I was hesitant to stay here because it looked a little old in the photos. However, because of the price and the reviews we took a chance. We were extremely satisfied and would stay again. It was clean, nice, the service was excellent, and the complimentary breakfast was great.

Reviews.Title: “Clean Hotel, Excellent Staff”
Reviews.Author: JaneinChicago
Reviews.Content: We found this hotel to very clean; the staff was very helpful; and the breakfast was good. Location is a short walk from the main street so it was very quiet. Beds were comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay, Great Value........”
Reviews.Author: bballin4him
Reviews.Content: We traveled to Branson for a anniversary get-away. I had stayed at other Comfort Inns in Branson and have had pleasant experiences at others as well. Thousand Hills was a great location, great staff, great hotel. The staff were very friendly and accomodating. They were courteous each time someone entered the lobby. The rooms were very clean and quiet. I appreciated that they room was very clean upon arriving back each day. You could not really hear any of the other guests while you were in your room. The breakfast bar was adequate for a continental breakfast, though it could be a little larger. I would definately stay here again. It was a great value for great accomodations. We will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Courteous and Friendly Staff... nicely furnished clean room!”
Reviews.Author: cbweoka
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed 2 nights at the Comfort Inn Thousand Hills in Branson, Mo. The beds were very comfortable, the room was very clean and the staff was friendly and very helpful. Thanks Comfort Inn for making our stay even more enjoyable!

Reviews.Title: “Best Choice Property Ever!”
Reviews.Author: provo1855
Reviews.Content: This is the best staff I've ever seen at a Choice Hotel. I'm a privilages member with choice and this staff did everything to help us feel comfortable. Everyone from the maintenance and housekeeping to the breakfast and desk staff were knowledgable about the area, the property and our needs. If there is a division of duties, it is seamless.

Reviews.Title: “Wow, what a beautiful place.”
Reviews.Author: TPIER6700
Reviews.Content: From the moment you walk in the front door, you are greeted with a smile. The hotel is beautiful and very clean. We really enjoyed our visit and plan to stay here the next time we are in Branson. The staff was very courteous, friendly and knowledgable.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay, great value”
Reviews.Author: riverratfamily
Reviews.Content: Stayed in double room on 4th floor and experience was great. Room was very clean and comfortable. Nice pool and hot tub with view of golf course. Pool is open late so that was a plus after returning from a night of sight seeing. Beds were comfortable. Location is great. It is not on the strip but is close enough and with easy access--also a lot quieter than staying on the strip but is located across the street from some tourist attractions. Outside is very nicely kept. Front desk staff friendly. The free continental breakfast was great---serving more than the regular continental breakfast (the waffles were great). Only negative I can think of was that the A/C did not put out very well(even I high and coldest setting we were barely comfortable)...I saw this on another review as well. It was not hot when we were there but I can imagine that it would not have been very pleasant in the room if it were. Overall great stay though.

Reviews.Title: “great stay, great personnel and great location”
Reviews.Author: travel1usa3
Reviews.Content: My sister, parents and I stayed at this comfort inn because of location. We were definitely not disappointed in anything while we stayed there. The desk clerks were all friendly. When we first arrived our toilet wasn't flushing properly, I called the front desk and told them. The manager hisself came up while we were out (we had told them we were leaving) and it was fixed while we were gone. He had left a very nice note telling us it was fixed, any more problems to let them know and he would make sure it was taken care of. The rooms were clean, spacious for 2 queen beds and the bathroom was clean. Very satisfied with our stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: dpmiss
Reviews.Content: This comfort inn was a great place to stay while in Branson. We walked to some of the theaters. We enjoyed their breakfast. Look no further if you want a great hotel, off the main road, that is top notch in quality without nickle diming you to death. Plenty of parking and close to restaurants and activities. We will stay here again!!!

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding stay”
Reviews.Author: lenapah
Reviews.Content: We came to Branson on our yearly trek to Silver Dollar City, as it is our now 8 year olds annual birthday gift, and decided to stay in the hotel because of the double queen suite it offered. Upon arrival we were warmly greeted and instanly given VIP treatment. We had 3 children under the age of 9 and they loved everything about the stay. Our room was huge and well stocked, the pool area was clean and the sauna was a gift too the bones. The easy access to Silver Dollar City was great as well as the location of things like mini golf, shows, and shops. Do yourself a favor, if traveling with family, stay here you wont be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “Great little hotel and great price”
Reviews.Author: lolly5249
Reviews.Content: My brother and I stayed here for a couple of days whilst visiting a friend who lives here. We're in our mid and late twenties. When looking for a hotel in Branson I wanted one with a good price, not looking for a fancy place, just a clean hotel in a good location- which is what we got. The rooms were a good size, we had 2 giant beds, nice clean bathroom. Simple decoration, well kept and clean. Temperature control thing for the room. The pool looked lovely (didn't have time to go in though) the breakfast area looked over the pool. Breakfast buffet included in the price was pretty reasonable with a choice (including make your own waffles section which my brother loved!). Staff were friendly and helpful. Location was good- although we chose this place as it was near where our friend lived. However I would say it was still pretty central. Cars or cabs are recommened though as everything is pretty spread out over Branson and it is VERY hilly. If the other Comfort Inns are as nice I would definately stay at one again.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable stay”
Reviews.Author: dandkkelly
Reviews.Content: Comfortable, spacious rooms, clean hotel, great location. Very nice indoor pool area. Grandson loved it. Preferred to stay at the hotel, rather than visit an arcade. Would absolutely recommend it to a friend. (The only negative was that we had a neighbor with a very small child who really, really wanted to open the door between the rooms -- usually at around 6 a.m. Can't blame the hotel for that)

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed our stay; Good location”
Reviews.Author: RetiredTravelerTN
Reviews.Content: We were very satisfied with our stay at Comfort Inn Thousand Hills one night in September. We also stayed one night at Comfort Inn West, and of the two, we prefer the Thousand Hills hotel. This hotel has an interior corridor and large, pleasant rooms. Our king room had a recliner, refrigerator, and microwave. The room was clean and comfortable with a nice layout. The breakfast was varied, ample, and tasty. The breakfast area was cramped for the number of people, but everyone was able to sit and enjoy the meal. The front desk staff were courteous and friendly. We will plan to stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Good Stay at Comfort Inn”
Reviews.Author: obitwriter
Reviews.Content: We stayed two nights at the Comfort Inn at Thousand Hills. We were very happy with our stay. The location was easy to get to even with all the traffic. The room was clean, had a refrigerator. The pool was too warm for me - 80 degrees so it wasn't very refreshing. Plenty of food at the free breakfast. You can walk to Lone Star Steakhouse and The Pasta House. Miniature golf is right across the street. We will stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Only hotel in Branson we will stay at!!”
Reviews.Author: rinnys
Reviews.Content: We live pretty close to Branson and travel there at least 2 or 3 times a year. Since discovering this hotel, we will not stay any where else. It is very clean (and that's super important to me) and I love the fact that it has two sinks(one outside the bathroom). They have a very nice, clean indoor pool area with a hot tub and sauna. My kids love it. Good breakfast, friendly staff and I love the fact that they have a ticket office in the gift shop. That keeps of from standing in line at shows or attractions. I also like the fact that it is a very convientent location. I have recommended this hotel to all of my family and friends and no one has been dissapointed.

Reviews.Title: “great place!”
Reviews.Author: topekamom
Reviews.Content: We stayed in one of the suites. It was really nice and clean. The service was excellent. We stayed three nights. The pool area was very clean. They had a nice gift shop. The room was very quiet. We would go back!

Reviews.Title: “they had free waffles”
Reviews.Author: Percyb
Reviews.Content: The pool was really awful, because there were about 30 screaming children from some dance team, and they would not hesitate to run and collide with you, and then proceed to splash you. The breakfast was fantastic-- belgian waffles! The location is really good. We stayed in the suite and it was really nice and clean; but the showerhead sprayed exclusively outside of the shower... that was a teensy problem.

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: RN1IL
Reviews.Content: This is a great hotel in a wonderful location in Branson. It is very easy to access everything around the city without getting in traffic. The staff was very friendly and my family loved the pool area. The only disappointment was the humidity level in the room. It was very hot during our stay and everything in the room felt wet and sticky. Maintenance was supposed to check it out, but the problem was not fixed. I don't think I would stay again during the summer because of this reason.

Reviews.Title: “great Stay”
Reviews.Author: Ron R
Reviews.Content: Tripadvistor Member Wisconsin (April 2007)....Stayed four days, the rooms were clean and enjoyed the extra sink. Staff was friendly and helpful. An early check-in was deeply apprecated. The location was also a plus. Pool area and outside deck was clean and fun place to spend time. The free continental extended breakfast was good. I would come back and recomend Thousand Hills as a good deal for the money.

Reviews.Title: “Good value for your dollar”
Reviews.Author: tippy1970
Reviews.Content: We stayed a few nights in this hotel and I'm glad we did. The staff is very friendly and helpful and made you feel at home. The king room we stayed in was very clean. The continental breakfast with the extras was pretty good (biscuit & gravy and waffles). The indoor pool is nice but not large and the nearby jacuzzi felt good and holds about 10 people. The hotel is located on the yellow bypass route which makes for some easy navigation around some of the traffic (remember, I said SOME of the traffic). If you need something extra, don't be scared to ask because the staff is very helpful. We will definitely stay here again.

HotelInfo.Name: Comfort Inn at Thousand Hills
HotelInfo.Address: 203 South Wildwood Drive, Branson, MO 65616
